channel.title: vagrant on Pai
channel.description: Recent content in vagrant on Pai

item.title: Towards Ansible -> Test Machine Setup and Tool Familiarization
item.description: In last post, we learnt what is ansible and why we need tool like ansible. We also setup the development environment. In this post we will setup a test machine using vagrant and get familiarized with ansible config and a few commands. Verify VirtualBox and Vagrant Installation Verify virtualbox and vagrant installation 1slashpai@pai  ~/vagrant/ansible  (⎈ |kind-pai:default) VBoxManage --version 26.1.4r136177 3slashpai@pai  ~/vagrant/ansible  (⎈ |kind-pai:default) vagrant --version 4Vagrant 2.
